scripts.check: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run lint:md && npm run check-types
scripts.push:prod: npm run switch:env -- prod && clasp push --force
scripts.push:test: npm run switch:env -- test && clasp push --force
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run switch:env -- prod && clasp push --force && clasp deploy
scripts.deploy:test: npm run switch:env -- test && clasp push --force && clasp deploy
scripts.open:dev:prod: npm run switch:env -- prod && clasp push --force && node tools/open-dev-url.js prod
scripts.open:dev:test: npm run switch:env -- test && clasp push --force && node tools/open-dev-url.js test
scripts.dev:test: npm run dev:build && npm run push:test
scripts.dev:prod: npm run dev:build && npm run push:prod
scripts.dev:open:test: npm run dev:build && npm run open:dev:test
scripts.dev:open:prod: npm run dev:build && npm run open:dev:prod
